```js
<Elevation z={4}>
  <div style={{ height: 100, padding: 16, fontFamily: "Roboto" }}>
    Elevated by 4dp
  </div>
</Elevation>
```

Transition animation:

```js
class ElevationExample extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props);
    this.state = { z: 2 };
  }

  render() {
    return (
      <Elevation
        z={this.state.z}
        transition
        onMouseEnter={() => this.setState({ z: 24 })}
        onMouseLeave={() => this.setState({ z: 2 })}
      >
        <div style={{ height: 100, padding: 16, fontFamily: "Roboto" }}>
          Hover over me!
        </div>
      </Elevation>
    );
  }
}

<ElevationExample />;
```
